lead_paragraph: England and Scotland are planning to defy a FIFA ban on players wearing poppies during their World Cup qualifier on Nov. 11, their Football Associations said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: England and Scotland to Defy FIFA Poppy Ban
headline.main: England and Scotland to Defy FIFA Poppy Ban
